name: Hit and Grab
description:
For the glory of our lord!

You, Pathetic Minion, and your Gang mates, have been chosen to clean up the dungeons of the dark castle.

The magic forges are dropping supplies in the wrong place and that has whetted the appetite of the guards

You have to get all the items before the golems eat them, By the way, if you can kill some of these vermin, you will be rewarded, the dungeon is overcrowded.

If you don´t want to die, you should work as a team and think fast, every minion is replaceable, but the failure is not an option
